trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Murrells Inlet
There were no other sightings in Murrells Inlet on or around September 8th 2011
divs: Sighting Details I was out riding bikes with may sister-inlaw and saw a big round red object with a tail, her son called he said he has been watching it for about five minutes, we saw it for about 2 minutes. Have no idea what it was.
Summary: It was like a big red ball with a tail, the way it was falling it looked like it might have gone in the ocean
